original_title: 關於我和鬼變成家人的那件事
overview: A traditional same sex marriage between a human and a ghost.  One day a police officer finds a red wedding envelope, only to find out that the owner of the red envelope is in fact a ghost from the other side asking for the officers hand in marriage before reincarnation. What will happen when a human and a ghost form a special bond?
title: Marry My Dead Body
